name: Molle Moln
description:
Molle Moln

Just like humans clouds have different hobbies. Clouds like Molle, that you will follow in this casual game, love to mess with humans and soak them wet. Help Molle grow stronger, and better, and reach for the top of the human soaking competition!

Highlights

  • Control Molle and collect points.
  • Use your earned XP to improve Molle or buy new skills.
  • Smite the ground with thunder.
  • Blow those pesky umbrellas away.

Earn XP and upgrade Molle

Learn skills that only the most powerfull clouds dream about!

Installation

Unzip the file and start the "Molle Moln.exe"
